amendment.description: To prevent millions of Americans from being kicked off their health coverage, suffering needlessly, getting sicker, and dying sooner.

action.text: Amendment SA 1156 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1156 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 73.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1156.
Amendment SA 1156 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1156 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1156 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 73.
